weekly_top_story.headline: Magnitude 7.5 Earthquake Triggers Tsunami Warnings and Mass Evacuations in Japan
weekly_top_story.summary: A powerful 7.5 magnitude earthquake struck Japan, prompting tsunami warnings and widespread evacuations, highlighting Japan's ongoing vulnerability to seismic activity and the need for robust disaster preparedness amid frequent natural hazards.

stories.headline: Bondi Beach Shooting: 12 Dead, Dozens Injured After Terrorist Attack at Sydney Hanukkah Event
stories.summary: A terrorist attack at a Hanukkah event on Bondi Beach in Sydney killed 12 and injured dozens, raising global concerns over rising antisemitic violence and security challenges at public gatherings.

stories.headline: Russia Launches Massive Wave of Drone and Missile Strikes on Ukraine, One of the Most Devastating Attacks Since Invasion
stories.summary: Russia conducted one of its largest drone and missile barrages on Ukraine over the weekend, intensifying the conflict and underscoring the challenges in achieving lasting peace amid ongoing escalations.
